chapter.title: Restcomm Admin User Interface
chapter.para: The admin user interface is a great way to perform repetive Restcomm task in a orderly manner. Care has been taken to make the user experience intuitive for those new to the platform. In this chapter, you will learn how to use some of the features available to create Clients, Phone Numbers, Check Call Logs, Get Speech-to-Text Transcription and many more

section.para: SIP Client is a feature that allows you to create a Restcomm profile that can be used for P2P or B2BUA calls. This will be empty until you create a new client. You can create a new client by clicking on the Resgister SIP Clent button.
